span.span: Tonasket School District would like to welcome you to our website! Feel free to explore the new web space and check out some of the features
including: calendars, news, and quick links. Subscribe to our Facebook feed to receive updates on school and district information!

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled March 16, 2020

div.div: Dear Tonasket School District Families and Community, As many of you know Governor Inslee mandated the executive order to close all schools until at least April 24, 2020. The building offices will remain open through Friday, March 20, for families to pick up their student’s belongings. Only staff essential to provide this help and to maintain the facility will be on campus this week...

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled 16 de marzo de 2020

div.div: Estimadas familias y comunidad del distrito escolar de Tonasket, Como muchos de ustedes saben, el gobernador Inslee ordenó la orden ejecutiva de cerrar todas las escuelas hasta al menos el 24 de abril de 2020. Las oficinas del edificio permanecerán abiertas hasta el viernes 20 de marzo, para que las familias recojan las pertenencias de sus estudiantes. Solo el personal esencial para proporcionar esta ayuda y mantener las instalaciones estará en el campus esta semana...
div.a: Read More about 16 de marzo de 2020

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Coronavirus Update

div.div: While health officials state that the immediate risk to the general public residing in the U.S., Washington State, and Okanogan County is reported to be low, we are taking the issue seriously. The health and safety of our students and staff is our first priority. Contingency planning is underway using information from local, state, and federal healthcare officials to prepare for and respond to any situation that may impact our schools and families...

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Actualización de Coronavirus

div.div: Si bien los funcionarios de salud afirman que se informa que el riesgo inmediato para el público en general que reside en los EE. UU., El estado de Washington y el condado de Okanogan es bajo, estamos tomando el problema en serio. La salud y seguridad de nuestros estudiantes y personal es nuestra primera prioridad. La planificación de contingencia está en marcha utilizando información de funcionarios de salud locales, estatales y federales para prepararse y responder a cualquier situación que pueda afectar nuestras escuelas y familias...
div.a: Read More about Actualización de Coronavirus

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled TSD Weekly Update 2/14/2020

div.div: On Thursday, Mike, Janet, and I met with First Responders to discuss the entryway security project for the buildings. We wanted to get their input on what works best for them and what they feel is the highest priority and most effective for them to do their work in case of an incident. Next week, we’ll meet with the separate building front office staff to get their ideas on what they feel will work best for their building and staff...
div.a: Read More about TSD Weekly Update 2/14/2020

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled SafeSchools Alert Letter

div.div: Safety is one of our district's top priorities and to help safeguard our school community, we've taken an important step that I want to share with you...
div.a: Read More about SafeSchools Alert Letter

div.div:
Having trouble accessing our website? Please contact the following for help:
Tech Office (509) 486-2162
District Office (509) 486-2126
